definition: to face the enemy/to meet an attack
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand

sentences.english: The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者來勢洶洶，我們要儘快想好應敵之策。
